titleStmt.title: SII 4.369: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 369. (A.R. No. 46 of 1890). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE SUNDARESVARA TEMPLE AT MADURA, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tribhuvaṉaccakravatti koṉeriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ cuntarapāṇṭiyamuṉaiyataraiyarkku Irāci
ṅkaṉkuḷakkiḻ naṅkaṇṭuḻavāṉa perumnallūr Uḷḷiṭṭa Ūrkaḷil Araṇceriuṭaiyar tiruvālavā
yuṭaiyanāyaṉāṟku tiruviḷakkuppuṟamākavun tamakkuk kāṇiyākavun tanta Ivvūṟku cūḻellaikkuk kiṭuḻallai
nāḷāṉ pakavaticcaturvvedimaṅkalattu vaṭapiṭākaiyil kaṭampaṉkuṭi Ellaikkuñ ciṟukuṭikkā lūṭaṟuttu Iva
rkaḷ karaiīṭā yaṉupokattukku meṟkun teṉṉellai meṟpaṭiyāraṉupokattukkum Aḷakāpurikkup po
kiṟavaḻikku vaṭakkum melellai pakavaticcaturvvedimaṅkalattā ṉaṉupokattukku kucumpānilaiye
llaikku kiḻakkum vaṭavellai meṟpaṭiyār Āloṭuceṅkuḷattilt teṉṉellaikkut teṟkum
ṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa naṉcai karuñcaikaḷum nattamu nattappā ṅkuḷapparappu māṟuṅ kālum toṭṭamum t
oṭṭakkūṟuṅ kāṭu moṭaiyum maramuṅ kiṇaṟum maṟṟu mer sama staprāptikaḷu muṭpaṭap paṇṭuṭaiyā
raiyum paḻaṅkāṇi Āḷaraiyum mutalilk kaḻittut tanta Ivvūṟku varu Antarāyam poṉvari viniyokaṅ kā
ttikaippoṉ kāttikaippaccaip piḷḷaiyār noṉpu nantavaṉappaccai Eṭuttukkāṭṭumpaccai Āṭttevai
matiṭtevai taccuttevai Āṉaiccālai kutiraippanti santu Ōlaieḻuttu viniyokam Olaieṭuppu vi
ṉiyokam vācal viniyokam ciṟaivaccu taṟiiṟai cekkiṟai ppāṭṭam Ervari Iṉavari Iṭaivarivuralvari vā
calvari cāraṭai kuḷavaṭai Oḻukkumiṉpāṭṭam pācippāṭṭam moṉampāṭṭam vaṇṇārkkaṟkācu Āyamuṭpaṭṭa Aṉaittu vupā
tikaḷu muṭpaṭap pattāvatu Aṟpacimātam mutal mutalaṭaṅka Iṟaiyiliyākak kaḻittu Uṭaiyār tiruvālavāyuṭaiyaṉāyanāṟkut tiru
viḷakkuppuramākavun tamakkuk kāṇiyākavun tantu Innāyaṉāṟku tiruviḷakkukku Innāḷ mutalāṇṭoṉṟukku vāṭākka
ṭamaiyāka Iraṇṭarai Accu Āṇṭutoṟu miruppārākavuñ colli Ivvūr kārum maṟuvum Irupūvum vampu karumpu
ceṅkaḻunir koḻuntu vāḻai mañcaḷ Iñci teṅku kamuku māp palāp parutti Āmaṇakku Uḷḷiṭṭa vāṉpayir puṉpayiru
muḷḷiṭṭaṉa veṇṭum payirceytuñ ceyvittuṅ koḷḷumpaṭiyuñ cella Ippaṭikkup pattāvatu Aṟpacimāta
m mutal mutalaṭaṅka Iṟaiyiliyākat tantu vari Ivar kaṇakkilun tu Ippaṭikku Ivvolai piṭipāṭāka
kkoṇṭu candrādityavaraicellak kalliluñ cempilum veṭṭikkoṇṭu Ivvūr nāṉkellaiyilun tiruccūlasthā
paṉamum paṇṇuvittukkoḷḷukiṟatu Ivai tuñcalūruṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai cuntarapāṇṭiyappallavaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku Ivai kalveṭṭineṉ sthapatiyarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . U tulyam Immutalukku caṅrādityavat tirunantāviḷakku Iraṇṭu Erivatāka [...]
Digital edition of SII 4.369 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
